Interface ISimpleProbe


  • public interface ISimpleProbe
    Simple interface for a generic probe.

    • Method Summary

      Get the probe's identifier

      Reads the probe's value.

      • writeValue

        boolean writeValue(java.lang.String key,
                 int value)
        Set the specific value of a parameter of the probe
        Parameters:
        key - the parameter to set
        value - value to be set.
        Returns:
        true if the operation has been successfully executed.

      • readValue

        boolean readValue(java.lang.String key)
        Reads the probe's value. A read request should force an event from the device
        Parameters:
        key - the parameter to read
        Returns:
        true if success
